Suicide prevention is a cause we can all do more to support. If you or a loved one is in distress or needs support & resources, call @800273TALK (8255) at any time. The National Suicide Prevention Lifeline is a 24/7, free, confidential service. They're there to help. Don't wait.

I commend Beth Ann for her mission to prevent suicide, especially among youth. She dedicated herself to this mission after learning of the suicide of a friend's child. She's since posted signs w/ Hotline @800273TALK at nearly every HS in Muskingum Co. Thank you Beth Ann! https://twitter.com/TimesRecorder/status/1201885313259442186Â â€¦
